mapper.select: SELECT EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD AS roomCd /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.SPEC_YN AS specYn /* 특가 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.DAY_PRICE_YN AS dayPriceYn /* 당일특가 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_NM AS roomNm /* 객실 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.NORMAL_AMT AS normalAmt /* 정상 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.STD_USER_CNT AS stdUserCnt /* 기준 인원 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.MAX_USER_CNT AS maxUserCnt /* 최대 인원 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.BREAKFAST_INCLUDE_YN AS breakfastIncludeYn /* 조식 포함 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.VIEWER AS viewer /* 전망, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_SIZE AS roomSize /* 객실 크기, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_SVC AS roomSvc /* 객실 서비스, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_OFFER_ITEM AS roomOfferItem /* 객실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.BATH_OFFER_ITEM AS bathOfferItem /* 욕실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.BATH_CNT AS bathCnt /* 욕실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.LIVING_CNT AS livingCnt /* 거실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.KITCHEN_CNT AS kitchenCnt /* 주방 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.TERRACE_CNT AS terraceCnt /* 테라스 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_INFO AS roomInfo /* 객실 정보, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE AS cancelFeeRule /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.LOMT_CNT AS lomtCnt /* 숙박 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.CUTOFF_DDCNT AS cutoffDdcnt /* 컷오프 일수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.TERM_DDCNT AS termDdcnt /* 텀 일수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.VIEWER LIKE '%' || #{viewer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 전망, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_SVC LIKE '%' || #{roomSvc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 객실 서비스, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_OFFER_ITEM LIKE '%' || #{roomOfferItem, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 객실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.BATH_OFFER_ITEM LIKE '%' || #{bathOfferItem, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 욕실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_INFO LIKE '%' || #{roomInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 객실 정보, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE LIKE '%' || #{cancelFeeRule, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD AS roomCd /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.SPEC_YN AS specYn /* 특가 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.DAY_PRICE_YN AS dayPriceYn /* 당일특가 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_NM AS roomNm /* 객실 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.NORMAL_AMT AS normalAmt /* 정상 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.STD_USER_CNT AS stdUserCnt /* 기준 인원 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.MAX_USER_CNT AS maxUserCnt /* 최대 인원 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.BREAKFAST_INCLUDE_YN AS breakfastIncludeYn /* 조식 포함 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.VIEWER AS viewer /* 전망, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_SIZE AS roomSize /* 객실 크기, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_SVC AS roomSvc /* 객실 서비스, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_OFFER_ITEM AS roomOfferItem /* 객실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.BATH_OFFER_ITEM AS bathOfferItem /* 욕실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.BATH_CNT AS bathCnt /* 욕실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.LIVING_CNT AS livingCnt /* 거실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.KITCHEN_CNT AS kitchenCnt /* 주방 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.TERRACE_CNT AS terraceCnt /* 테라스 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_INFO AS roomInfo /* 객실 정보, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE AS cancelFeeRule /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.LOMT_CNT AS lomtCnt /* 숙박 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.CUTOFF_DDCNT AS cutoffDdcnt /* 컷오프 일수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.TERM_DDCNT AS termDdcnt /* 텀 일수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD = #{param.roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = #{param.faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.VIEWER LIKE '%' || #{param.viewer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 전망, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_SVC LIKE '%' || #{param.roomSvc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 객실 서비스, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_OFFER_ITEM LIKE '%' || #{param.roomOfferItem, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 객실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.BATH_OFFER_ITEM LIKE '%' || #{param.bathOfferItem, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 욕실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_INFO LIKE '%' || #{param.roomInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 객실 정보, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE LIKE '%' || #{param.cancelFeeRule, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */
ORDER BY EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_DIST_ROOM SET /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ SPEC_YN = #{specYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 특가 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,DAY_PRICE_YN = #{dayPriceYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 당일특가 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,ROOM_NM = #{roomNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,NORMAL_AMT = #{normalAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정상 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,STD_USER_CNT = #{stdUserCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 기준 인원 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MAX_USER_CNT = #{maxUserCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최대 인원 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,BREAKFAST_INCLUDE_YN = #{breakfastIncludeYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 조식 포함 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,VIEWER = #{viewer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 전망, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,ROOM_SIZE = #{roomSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 크기, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,ROOM_SVC = #{roomSvc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 서비스, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,ROOM_OFFER_ITEM = #{roomOfferItem, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,BATH_OFFER_ITEM = #{bathOfferItem, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 욕실 구비 품목, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,BATH_CNT = #{bathCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 욕실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,LIVING_CNT = #{livingCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 거실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,KITCHEN_CNT = #{kitchenCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 주방 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,TERRACE_CNT = #{terraceCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 테라스 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,ROOM_INFO = #{roomInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 정보, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,CANCEL_FEE_RULE = #{cancelFeeRule, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,LOMT_CNT = #{lomtCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 숙박 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,CUTOFF_DDCNT = #{cutoffDdcnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 컷오프 일수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,TERM_DDCNT = #{termDdcnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 텀 일수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
